Sentencas: A new concept is proposed for combined fermentation (two-stage high-load fermenter) and gasification (two-stage fluidised bed gasifier with CO2 separation) of sewage sludge and wood, and the subsequent utilisation of the biogenic gases in a hybrid power plant, consisting of a solid oxide fuel cell and a gas turbine.
Titulo: Power generation based on biomass by combined fermentation and gasification - A new concept derived from experiments and modelling

Sentencas: The development and optimisation of the important processes of the new concept (fermentation, gasification, utilisation) are reported in detail.
Titulo: Power generation based on biomass by combined fermentation and gasification - A new concept derived from experiments and modelling

Sentencas: For the gas production, process parameters were experimentally and numerically investigated to achieve high conversion rates of biomass.
Titulo: Power generation based on biomass by combined fermentation and gasification - A new concept derived from experiments and modelling

Sentencas: For the product gas utilisation, important combustion properties (laminar flame speed, ignition delay time) were analysed numerically to evaluate machinery operation (reliability, emissions).
Titulo: Power generation based on biomass by combined fermentation and gasification - A new concept derived from experiments and modelling

Sentencas: Furthermore, the coupling of the processes was numerically analysed and optimised by means of integration of heat and mass flows.
Titulo: Power generation based on biomass by combined fermentation and gasification - A new concept derived from experiments and modelling

Sentencas: The high, simulated electrical efficiency of 42% including the conversion of raw biomass is promising for future power generation by biomass.
Titulo: Power generation based on biomass by combined fermentation and gasification - A new concept derived from experiments and modelling
